alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sedgwick County through 645 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cheney, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Haysville, Goddard, Maize, Clearwater, Cheney, Garden Plain, West Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport and Lake Afton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Kansas.
